programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.title: THE SULTAN ENTERTAINMENT
programme.desc: The Sultan is a talk show featuring two sultan-like hosts: Sultan Andara and Raffi Ahmad and Sultan Bintaro and Andre Taulany, accompanied by a cast of beautiful and handsome employees. It features spectacular guest stars and is definitely not to be missed. Find out more at The Sultan Entertainment.

programme.title: CERIA (R.)
programme.desc: Fun and interesting facts & information told and hosted by children

programme.title: TEMU LAWAK
programme.desc: This program presents comedy in every episode. The comedy gathering was enlivened by senior comedians and also young comedians as well as beautiful, handsome, popular and contemporary guest stars who were ready to make the audience laugh with various entertaining stories in each episode.

programme.title: Supir Tembak Panah Asmara
programme.desc: Adam (Hardi Fadillah), who finally returns to Jakarta and wants to meet his childhood crush, ends up getting lost after asking Tiara (Yuriska Patricia), an angkot driver, for directions. In the end, they don’t meet again. Will they finally meet in the end?

programme.title: Cinderela Gadungan Gak Pake Sepatu Kaca
programme.desc: Cinderella wears glass shoes everywhere, this one wears boots, likes to ride motorcycles, and is a tomboy. RAISYA BAWAZIER doesn't care, the important thing is to be happy. Different things with DIMAS ANGGARA as an artist who has a lot of fans but really wants RAISYA.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.desc: A news magazine program that provides information about unique and previously unknown things that happen in the Indonesian archipelago

programme.title: TAKDIR
programme.desc: Takdir is a program that discusses disasters, problems, and destiny in human life with various situations in real life.

programme.title: BINTANG PANTURA 5
programme.desc: The Pantura Bintang Stage is back looking for Bintang. Excitement, cuteness, rocking each other to become a star.

programme.title: Pemenang Hati Satpamwati
programme.desc: It turns out that the winner of Sarah’s heart, the beautiful and fierce security guard, is Oji. Even though their parents had already arranged a match for them, it turns out they had already fallen in love long before that.

programme.title: Semoga Harimu Digeprek Cinta Terus
programme.desc: Dimas and Maya pretend to be married in order to get a gift from oma, but day after day Maya helps Dimas sell chicken geprek, feelings for each other arise.

programme.title: King Of Strawberry Tak Pernah Ingkar Janji
programme.desc: MIKA (22 YEARS OLD) deliberately came to the cafe with several journalists to cover a surprise birthday party for her boyfriend. She wanted it to be hot news and her YouTube content to go viral so that her acting career would skyrocket, but the opposite happened. Mika caught her boyfriend DONI (25 YEARS OLD) hugging her own best friend SINTA (22 YEARS OLD). Mika slapped Doni and demanded a breakup

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Melepaskan Cewek Rempeyek
programme.desc: It turns out it’s really hard to forget Leha (Josephine Firmstone), the nerdy girl who sells rempeyek. At first, Galang (Erdin Werdrayana) only used Leha to get good grades, but he ended up genuinely falling in love.
